description: [``botocore``] This release adds support for strict ordering for stateful rule groups. Using strict ordering, stateful rules are evaluated in the exact order in which you provide them.
[``botocore``] This release enables subscribers to set up automatic exports of newly published revisions using the new EventAction API.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for mobile device access overrides management in Amazon WorkMail.

[``botocore``] This release of the Account Management API enables customers to manage the alternate contacts for their AWS accounts. For more information, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/accounts/latest/reference/accounts-welcome.html

[``botocore``] Added CreateUpdatedWorkspaceImage API to update WorkSpace images with latest software and drivers. Updated DescribeWorkspaceImages API to display if there are updates available for WorkSpace images.
[``botocore``] Initial release of the SDK for AWS Cloud Control API
[``botocore``] Amazon S3 bucket metadata now indicates whether an error or a bucket's permissions settings prevented Amazon Macie from retrieving data about the bucket or the bucket's objects.
